channel.title: Please help,i have java and it says its not recongnized(more info inside)help
channel.description:
Ok ive tried almost everything and still nothing happens i have java and it says
'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
someone please help!Also do not spam Example:Ohh this happen to me.
If you do not have a solution please do not post thank you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2008, 07:57:04 PM[/size][hr]Thats a client im trying to run.
